summary: This is an email chain from May 2019 between Assistant U.S. Attorneys and FBI personnel regarding the Southern District of New York's request for FBI Florida to ship the complete case files from the investigations into Jeffrey Epstein and a related individual to SDNY for copying, to support their ongoing investigation and potential criminal charges.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email states SDNY has an open investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and is requesting the related FBI Florida case files.

events.title: SDNY requests Epstein case files from FBI Florida
events.description: The Southern District of New York formally requests that FBI Florida ship all case files from the investigations into Jeffrey Epstein and a related individual to SDNY so a vendor can copy them for their ongoing investigation.

keyFacts: In May 2019, the Southern District of New York had an open investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and was working in partnership with FBI New York.
SDNY formally requested FBI Florida to ship all case files from the Epstein investigation and a related investigation to them for copying.
The requested materials included official case files and several boxes of agent work-product.
The purpose was to ensure SDNY had a complete copy of all records for their investigation and to prepare for potential discovery obligations if criminal charges were filed.
The email indicates coordination was occurring between case agents in Florida and New York regarding the transfer of these materials.
